data.message: The latest version of Facebook mobile  constantly crashes on android devices after recent updates.

replies.message: Hi Michael. If you're still experiencing this issue after uninstalling and reinstalling your app, please report it to us here: http://bit.ly/2jZwe1o. -Joe
That's not helping the situation at all.  I've tried uninstalling and reinstalling several times over and still have the same problem.
Simply put, the problem is in the app itself.  I guess I'll just have to use Facebook on my laptop or desktop  instead until this issue is resolved.

I also want my messaging ability without the need for a separate app back on mobile.  I had to delete the app from my phone to make space for other apps and necessary updates  and cannot put the app back on my phone.  We don't need a separate software program for messenger on the desktop or laptop so WHY is Facebook forcing us to use a separate app for messages on mobile devices?  It's not right and not fair.
As soon as a new social media site comes along  you can bet money that I'll be leaving Facebook for it.
